blocks.origin: const class cehl { EEhil }

blocks.name: diff.cehl.s
diff.cehl.c
diff.cehl.w
df-rrx
blocks.content: Define the function associating with a set the free real vector space on that set, equipped with the natural inner product and norm. This is the direct sum of copies of the field of real numbers indexed by that set. We call it here a "generalized real Euclidean space", but note that it need not be complete (for instance if the given set is infinite countable). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: df-ehl
blocks.content: Define a function generating the real Euclidean spaces of finite dimension. The case ` n = 0 ` corresponds to a space of dimension 0, that is, limited to a neutral element (see ~ ehl0 ). Members of this family of spaces are Hilbert spaces, as shown in - ehlhl . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: rrxval
blocks.content: Value of the generalized Euclidean space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(crrx, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(crrx, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(crrx, c0), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, crrx, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, cv(hs0)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crefld, cfrlm)
  df-rrx(hs0)
  fvex(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrxval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(RR^ ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (RR^ ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (RR^ ` c0)=(toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, crrx, (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]hs0)))
  fveq2d(ctcph, (RRfld[freeLMod]hs0), (RRfld[freeLMod]c0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, crefld, cfrlm)
  df-rrx(hs0)
  fvex(ctcph, (RRfld[freeLMod]c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
}

blocks.name: rrxbase
blocks.content: The base of the generalized real Euclidean space is the set of functions with finite support. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 22-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxbase(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crrx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  3eqtr4d(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(cbs, c3, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  rrxval(c0, c1, c3)
  tcphbas(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  refld()
  frlmbas(s0, crefld, cfield, c0, c1, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), cr, nat0)
  eqid(co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))
  rebase()
  re0g()
  eqid(crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)))
  diff.crefld.s(s0)
  diff.cfield.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrxbase(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 })
  ‚ä£ c3 =(RR^ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 }), d(s0, c2))
  3eqtr4d(c2, { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 }, (Base ` c3), (Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl6eqr((Base ` c3), (Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (Base `(toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0))), c0 ‚àà c1)
  fveq2d(cbs, c3, (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà c1)
  rrxval(c0, c1, c3)
  tcphbas((Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (RRfld[freeLMod]c0))
  eqid((toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
  eqid((Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 =(Base ` c3))
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 } =(Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), RRfld ‚àà Field)
  refld()
  frlmbas(s0, crefld, cfield, c0, c1, { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 }, (RRfld[freeLMod]c0), cr, nat0)
  eqid((RRfld[freeLMod]c0))
  rebase()
  re0g()
  eqid({ s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)| s0[finSupp]0 })
  diff.crefld.s(s0)
  diff.cfield.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rrxprds
blocks.content: Expand the definition of the generalized real Euclidean spaces. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxprds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(crrx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(c2, cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtr4d(co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3), co(co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), cress, cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), co(co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), cress, cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  frlmpws(crefld, cfield, c0, c1, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
  eqid(co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))
  oveq12d(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3, co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqcomd(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr))))), wcel(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr), universe))
  fvex(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)
  pwsval(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr), universe, c0, c1, co(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0), crefld)
  oveq1i(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cpws, c0, cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr))
  eqtr4i(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr), cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cfv(cbs, crefld)))
  rlmval(crefld)
  fveq2i(cfv(csra, crefld), cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
  eqtr3i(crefld, cfv(csca, cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)), co(crefld, cress, cr))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(crefld, cress, cr), crefld), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  refld()
  ressid(crefld, cfield, cr)
  mptru(wceq(co(crefld, cress, cr), cfv(csca, cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr))))
  srasca(crefld, cr, cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wss(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))
  eqimssi(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
  rebase()
  3eqtr4g(c3, cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(cbs, c2, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  rrxval(c0, c1, c2)
  tcphbas(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrxprds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(toCPreHil `((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)}))[|`s]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(RR^ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(c2, (toCPreHil `((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)}))[|`s]c3)), (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà c1)
  fveq2d(ctcph, (RRfld[freeLMod]c0), ((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)}))[|`s]c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqtr4d((RRfld[freeLMod]c0), ((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)}))[|`s]c3), (((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0)[|`s](Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0))), c0 ‚àà c1)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, (RRfld[freeLMod]c0)=(((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0)[|`s](Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0))), RRfld ‚àà Field)
  frlmpws(crefld, cfield, c0, c1, (RRfld[freeLMod]c0), (Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
  eqid((RRfld[freeLMod]c0))
  oveq12d((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)})), cress, c3, ((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0), (Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqcomd((RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)})), ((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, ((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0)=(RRfld[√ó](c0 √ó {((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)})), ((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex((subringAlg ` RRfld), cr)
  pwsval(((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù), universe, c0, c1, ((ringLMod ` RRfld)[^]c0), crefld)
  oveq1i((ringLMod ` RRfld), cpws, c0, ((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù))
  eqtr4i((ringLMod ` RRfld), ((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù), ((subringAlg ` RRfld)`(Base ` RRfld)))
  rlmval(crefld)
  fveq2i((subringAlg ` RRfld), cr, (Base ` RRfld))
  eqtr3i(crefld, (Scalar `((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)), (RRfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  ax-mp((RRfld[|`s]‚Ñù)= RRfld, RRfld ‚àà Field)
  refld()
  ressid(crefld, cfield, cr)
  mptru((RRfld[|`s]‚Ñù)=(Scalar `((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù)))
  srasca(crefld, cr, ((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù), wtru)
  eqidd(((subringAlg ` RRfld)` ‚Ñù), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, ‚Ñù ‚äÜ(Base ` RRfld))
  eqimssi(cr, (Base ` RRfld))
  rebase()
  3eqtr4g(c3, (Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (Base ` c2), (Base `(toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0))), c0 ‚àà c1)
  fveq2d(cbs, c2, (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), c0 ‚àà c1)
  rrxval(c0, c1, c2)
  tcphbas((Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)), (RRfld[freeLMod]c0))
  eqid((toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
  eqid((Base `(RRfld[freeLMod]c0)))
}

blocks.name: rrxip
blocks.content: The inner product of the generalized real Euclidean spaces. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxip(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(crrx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, c2))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, c2))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, c2))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  eqtr2d(cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, c2), cfv(cip, cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3))), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(cip, c2, cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), wcel(c0, c1))
  rrxprds(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5eqr(cfv(cip, cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3))), cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), wcel(c0, c1))
  tcphip(cfv(cip, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3))
  eqid(cfv(ctcph, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cip, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)))
  syl5eqr(cfv(cip, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3)), cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), co(cr, cmap, c0), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cfv(cip, co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cip, co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr))))), cfv(cip, co(co(crefld, cprds, cxp(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(csra, crefld), cr)))), cress, c3))), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c2)

blocks.name: rrxcph
blocks.content: Generalized Euclidean real spaces are subcomplex pre-Hilbert spaces. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 22-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: rrxds
blocks.content: The distance over generalized Euclidean spaces. Compare with ~ df-rrn . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 20-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxds(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))))), cfv(cds, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crrx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))))), cfv(cds, c3), cfv(cds, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), ccom(cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), cfv(csg, co(crefld, cfrlm, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: rrxvsca
blocks.content: The scalar product over generalized Euclidean spaces is the componentwise real number multiplication. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxvsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(crrx, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c3)))), wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  eqtrd(cfv(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), c2), c3), w0)
  fveq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), c2), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), w0)
  syl5eq(c1, cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), cfv(cvsca, c4), w0)
  fveq2d(cvsca, c4, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), w0)
  frlmvscaval(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), c2, c3, cmul, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5), crefld, c5, cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), cr, c7, w0)
  eqid(co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))
  rebase()
  eleqtrd(c2, cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), w0)
  fveq2d(cbs, c4, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), wcel(c5, c7))
  rrxval(c5, c7, c4)
  tcphbas(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)))
  eqcomi(cfv(cvsca, cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))), cfv(cvsca, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)))
  tcphvsca(cfv(cvsca, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)), co(crefld, cfrlm, c5))
  eqid(cfv(ctcph, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, co(crefld, cfrlm, c5)))
  remulr()
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)` c3)=(c0[√ó](c2 ` c3)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(RR^ ` c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(Base ` c4))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)` c3)=(c0[√ó](c2 ` c3))), c6 =(Base ` c4))
  eqtrd(((c0[c1]c2)` c3), (c0[√ó](c2 ` c3)), ((c0[(√ó `(toCPreHil `(RRfld[freeLMod]c5)))]c2)` c3), w0)

blocks.name: rrx0el
blocks.content: The zero ("origin") in a generalized real Euclidean space is an element of its base set. (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrx0el(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cr, cmap, c0))
} = {
  3eltr4g(c2, c3, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c0)), wf(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, cr))
  fssd(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, cr, csn(nat0), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, csn(nat0)))
  fconst(c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(csn(nat0), cr))
  mpbi(wss(csn(nat0), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(nat0, cr), wss(csn(nat0), cr)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  snssg(nat0, cr, cr)
  elmapd(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cr, c0, universe, c1, wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrx0el(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c0 √ó { 0 })
  ‚ä£ c3 =(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)
} = {
  3eltr4g(c2, c3, (c0 √ó { 0 }), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 √ó { 0 })‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0), ((c0 √ó { 0 }): c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  fssd((c0 √ó { 0 }), c0, cr, { 0 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, ((c0 √ó { 0 }): c0 ‚Üí { 0 }))
  fconst(c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, { 0 } ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  mpbi({ 0 } ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ax-mp((0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üî { 0 } ‚äÜ ‚Ñù), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  0re()
  snssg(nat0, cr, cr)
  elmapd((c0 √ó { 0 }), cr, c0, universe, c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå)
  reex()
  id(c0 ‚àà c1)
}

}

blocks.name: rrxmval
blocks.content: The value of the Euclidean metric. Compare with ~ rrnmval . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxmval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, cun(co(c2, csupp, nat0), co(c4, csupp, nat0)), co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, cfv(crrx, c0)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, cun(co(c2, csupp, nat0), co(c4, csupp, nat0)), co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c2, c5, c4, cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, cun(co(c2, csupp, nat0), co(c4, csupp, nat0)), co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))), c3, c3, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2)))), universe, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(c5, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2)))))))
  eqtr4d(c5, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6reqr(c5, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2))))), cfv(cds, cfv(crrx, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(csqrt, co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2)))))), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0))), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0))))
  syl6reqr(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), crab(s1, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, nat0)), wcel(c0, c1))

  oveq2d(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2)), cmpt(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))))
  mpteq2dv(hs2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cexp, nat2, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))))

  -| wceq(c3, crab(s3, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s3), cfsupp, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, cfv(crrx, c0)))

thm rrxmetlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, co(cr, cmap, c4), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, nat0)))

  ‚ä£ c3 = { s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c4)| s1[finSupp]0 }

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà((c0[supp]0)‚ãÉ(c1[supp]0)),(((c0 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0))[^]2))= sum(s0 ‚àà c2,(((c0 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0))[^]2))), c5 =(dist `(RR^ ` c4)))

blocks.content: Euclidean space is a metric space. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: rrxdstprj1
blocks.content: The distance between two points in Euclidean space is greater than the distance between the projections onto one coordinate. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: rrxbasefi
blocks.content: The base of the generalized real Euclidean space, when the dimension of the space is finite. This justifies the use of ` ( RR ^m X ) ` for the development of the Lebesgue measure theory for n-dimensional real numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxbasefi(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(cr, cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(crrx, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, c0, co(cr, cmap, c1), w0)
  syl6eqss(c0, co(cr, cmap, c1), crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), w0)
  ssrab2(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), c0, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)))
  fdmfifsupp(cv(hs0), nat0, c1, cr, universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cr))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), cr, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1))), wcel(nat0, universe))
  c0ex()
  rabid(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, c1)), wceq(crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), c0))
  eqcomd(crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))), wcel(c1, cfn))
  rrxbase(hs0, c1, cfn, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cr, cmap, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
}

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

} = {

  fveq2d(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)), co(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))

  oveq1i(crefld, cgsu, cmpt(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)), co(ccnfld, cress, cr))

blocks.name: rrxmetfi
blocks.content: Euclidean space is a metric space. Finite dimensional version. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrxmetfi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, co(cr, cmap, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, cfv(crrx, c0)))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c1, cfv(cmet, co(cr, cmap, c0)), cfv(cmet, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  rrxmet(hs0, c0, cfn, c1, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)))
  eqid(crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)))
  fveq2d(cmet, crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  eqtr3d(crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0)), co(cr, cmap, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  rrxbase(hs0, c0, cfn, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), cfv(crrx, c0))
  rrxbasefi(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)), c0, cfv(crrx, c0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  id(wcel(c0, cfn))
  eqid(cfv(crrx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, c0)))
}

  fveq2d(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)), csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))

  ‚ä¢ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt `((((s0 ` 1)[-](s1 ` 1))[^]2)[+](((s0 ` 2)[-](s1 ` 2))[^]2))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(EEhil ` 2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]{ 1, 2 })

} = {
  eqtri(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt `((((s0 ` 1)[-](s1 ` 1))[^]2)[+](((s0 ` 2)[-](s1 ` 2))[^]2)))), (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(hs0 ‚àà { 1, 2 },(((s0 ` hs0)[-](s1 ` hs0))[^]2)))))

  fveq2d(csqrt, sum(hs0 ‚àà { 1, 2 },(((s0 ` hs0)[-](s1 ` hs0))[^]2)), ((((s0 ` 1)[-](s1 ` 1))[^]2)[+](((s0 ` 2)[-](s1 ` 2))[^]2)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))

  oveq12d((s0 ` hs0), cmin, (s1 ` hs0), (s0 ` 1), (s1 ` 1), hs0 = 1)

  recnd((((s0 ` 1)[-](s1 ` 1))[^]2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))

  resubcld((s0 ` 1), (s1 ` 1), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))

  pm3.2i(1 ‚àà ùïå, 2 ‚àà ùïå)

  oveq12d(co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), nat1)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), nat2), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), nat2)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(c0, nat1), cmin, cfv(c2, nat1)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(c0, nat2), cmin, cfv(c2, nat2)), cexp, nat2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
